title: OG Envy is looking for a plat+ mid laner for their sister team.
body:
PLEASE READ ENTIRE POST BEFORE DOING ANYTHING

OG Envy is a team that participates multiple leagues and has a secondary team that participates in tournaments and leagues of their own. The secondary team will be independent of OG Envy but is still expected to be scrim partners with them. We are currently we are looking for mid laner that is Platinum 5 or higher. After reading the post if this seems like something you are interested in please post your application (located at the bottom of the post) THEN add my IGN. Please remember to post an application first then message me. If you can't follow simple rules then you aren't ready for a serious team. Once we have found a top laner we will post "No longer taking applications" at the top of the post, so until you see that don't be afraid to apply.

PM me at-
IGN: I Am A VirJhin

The tryouts will consist of three rounds.

Round 1: This phase will consist of reviewing your applications and interviewing the applicants to see where you stand in game knowledge and what you feel like you could bring to the team.

Round 2: This phase will consist of all the applicants who made it past round one playing games with the teams to see if the team deems them fit for round 3. These games' purpose is for us to get an idea of your identity and your play style, as a result these games can be a minimum of 1 game or up to as many as 4 for the teams to make a decision.

Round 3: The top 2 applicants from Round 2 will be asked to play a 5v5 against the main team to see how they perform. The applicant that performs better will be chosen.

Current Roster
Top:
Jungle: The Indigo Child
Mid:
ADC: Akon the Kid
Support: Karrelan

Must Haves Before Applying
1. A working microphone
2. Discord
3. Be 16+ years old
4. Fluent English speaker
5. A sense of humor...although this is a competitive team that does not mean we don't know how to have a good time.

What We Expect
- A confident player that understands and mains 1 role.
- Solid base knowledge of the team for a jumping off point for any future coaching/criticism and teachability.
- The ability to communicate frequently with the team
- A consistent schedule (if your schedule varies from week to week, please consider this before applying)
- Maturity and the ability to relax and take things serious when it comes time to play.
- A willingness to learn, communicate, synergize. and grow as a team.
- Dedication

Application Form (copy and paste this into your post):
-- Summoner Name:
-- Role you are applying for:
-- Current rank:
-- Age:
-- Timezone:
-- Times available:
-- Top 5 champs in role:
-- Playstyle:
-- Past experience with teams:
-- Why are you interested in us:

Remember, post your application first then add me! Thank you for your application.
